title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.23 - Lamphrey fronts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.23 - Lamphrey fronts

State Regulations

Each boiler fitted with a Lamphrey boiler furnace mouth
protector, or similar appliance, having valves on the pipes connecting them to
the boiler, shall have these valves locked or sealed open. Such valves, when
used, shall be of the straightway type. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
